thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Murder NW

author: news24.com
title: Murder NW
text:
During the previous financial year the NW government ceased to maintain roads in the Vryburg/Molopo area.
Rumour had it that the budget was "attached" for other unbudgeted expenses. This was denied by relevant personnel.
Now we know the truth. Roads are still not being maintained and rumour now has it that the national treasurer attached the budget for other unbudgeted expenses.
What mafia type links in our NW government are causing it citizens to travel on the worst roads in the country?Who is going to lose his life next?
Come on Supra!! Be remembered for good governance and not for a leader whose sole effort is enriching himself.
